response.overview: Celebrate the holidays in purrfect style with everyone’s favorite leche-loving feline, Puss in Boots! Cuddle up with El Macho Gato in front of a crackling custom Yule Log for some milk and cookies and a little visit from Gingy.  Country: USA  "Puss in Boots' Yule Log" — animation, family and kids movie produced in USA and released in 2022. It is a feature-length film with a runtime of 1h. "Puss in Boots' Yule Log" is not currently available to stream in India. Save it and we'll notify you when it's available! Make sure to turn on push notifications as well.
response.title: Puss in Boots' Yule Log
